Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I haven’t had this exact experience but I have had something similar with SH. When there’s something I rely on to deal with life, and there is a threat of that thing being taken away, my anxiety goes through the roof. I need this thing. *I need this thing.* (And how do I cope with distressing emotions? Yup. With the thing.)   It sounds like your therapist is trying to help you find ways to slow down the addictive cycle and build momentum in a new, healthy cycle. For me, that process definitely involves discomfort and a mix of steps forward + steps back. It’s a courageous thing to explore new ways of being and I promise nobody does it perfectly <3
